Direct Known Subclasses:
RecognizerNode, SpeakerProfileNode, SynthesizerNode, VoiceNode
public class SpeechNode
extends BasicTreeNode

A BasicTreeNode which can display a check-box if isSelectable is overwritten to return true.

See Also:
Serialized Form
